column1: “The new norms of the coronavirus era... for the deaf and hard-of-hearing have transformed quotidian tasks into technological labyrinths, and exposed a number of inequities in local health and government systems.” ⁦@mikafrak⁩
walking around the neighborhood. all of the old people wearing a mask. virtually none of the younger-than-old people wearing masks. I need to get used to this. #coronavirus #BloomingdaleDC
